Is it a correct statement that if fitness between two
genomes is never equal that structure can only be
added via mutation (add node/connection) and not
through crossover since disjoint and excess are always
taken from the parent with higher fitness?

Is this implementation dependent? 

If discussion of this has taken place before let me
know so I can look it up myself and not clutter up the
list.

Thanks-
Karl
